items.sentence: Were you the one who told Tom about what happened?
What are the chances of this ever happening again?
It would take a long time to tell the whole story.
Tom didn\'t know how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was going to Australia.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary had put her suitcases.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary usually went shopping.
Tom was my younger brother\'s roommate in college.
Some people were sunbathing, others were swimming.
I had never seen a giraffe till I visited the zoo.
